articles.description: Erling Haaland was rumoured to have a release clause specifically related to a proposed transfer to Real Madrid in his Manchester City contract, but that isn't the case according to Pep Guardiola
articles.content:
Pep Guardiola has confirmed that Erling Haaland does not have a release clause in his Manchester City contract. 
It was claimed this week that the 22-year-old's lucrative deal at the Etihad included… [+2695 chars]

articles.title: Sevilla 1-4 Borussia Dortmund: Jude Bellingham stars as Germans claim emphatic win - BBC
articles.description: England midfielder Jude Bellingham scores one and sets up another as Borussia Dortmund ease past Sevilla to tighten their grip on second place in Group G.
articles.content:
Bellingham became the youngest captain to score in the Champions League
